data.actual_result: The gif emote has a static png and doesn’t disappear properly
data.expected_result: The gif emote should cycle normal in the preview and thus should disappear properly
data.short_description: Gif emotes not cycling correctly in emote preview but do show correctly in chat [Nitro required!]
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in the unofficial hypesquad balance server so u have their emotes - Create a server or have an existing one - Go to your chatbox and type `:dontfeelsobalanced:` - Observe how it looks odd in the emote preview, but does look normal when pasting in chat.
